LanguageData.UT_StackUsage_Abhorrent.label: abhorrent
LanguageData.UT_StackUsage_Abhorrent.description: To make oneself immortal with technology is against moral laws.
LanguageData.UT_StackUsage_Disapproved.label: disapproved
LanguageData.UT_StackUsage_Disapproved.description: To make oneself immortal with technology is an ugly, dirty act.
LanguageData.UT_StackUsage_Approved.label: approved
LanguageData.UT_StackUsage_Approved.description: Humans should strive to reach immortallity by improving our flawed natural bodies.
